avanenu, kevala harisi bidalada ondu hani viryavagiralillave
taruvaya avanu rakta pindavadanu. A balika avanu (allahanu) avanannu srstisidanu mattu rupisidanu
Munde adarindale purusa mattu stri emba ibbara jodiyannuntu madidanu
anthavanu (istella madidavanu) sattavarannu jivantagolisalu asamarthane
manusyanu, tanondu prastapa yogya vastuve allavagidda kalavondannu kaledillave
navu manusyanannu pariksisalikkagi, avanannu misrita viryadinda srstisiruvevu. Mattu navu avanannu kela ballavanagiyu noda ballavanagiyu madiruvevu
nave avanige dariyannu torisidevu. Innavanu krtajnanagali athava krtaghnanagali
navu dhikkarigaligagi sarapanigalannu nogagalannu bhugileluva benkiyannu sid'dhapadisittiruvevu
sajjanaru (svargadalli) pana patreyinda karpura misrita paniyavondannu sevisuttiruvaru
a cilumeyinda allahana dasaru kudiyuvaru mattu adarinda halavu kaluvegalannu horadisuvaru
(ihalokadalli) avaru, tam'ma harakeyannu iderisuttare. Mattu sarvavyapi sankatada dinavannu anjuttiruttare
avaru avana (allahana) meccugegagi nirgatikarige, anatharige mattu kaidigalige una badisuttare
(mattu avaru heluttare;) ‘‘navu kevala allahana meccugegagi nimage unisuttiddeve. Nim'minda navu yavude pratiphalavannagali krtajnateyannagali bayasuvudilla’’
‘‘namage nam'modeyana kadeyinda baraliruva karala hagu kathora (punarut'thana) dinada bhayavide’’
allahanu avarannu a dinada haniyinda raksisuvanu. Mattu avarige ullasa hagu santosavannu niduvanu
avara sahaneya phalavagi avarige svarga hagu resmeya udugeyannu dayapalisuvanu
alli avaru asanagala mele dimbugalige oragi kondiruvaru. Alli avaru tiksna bisilannagali tivra caliyannagali kanalararu
adara (svarga totada) neralu avarannu avarisiruvudu. Adarallina hannina goncalugalu avarige etukuttiruvavu
Belliya patregalannu subhravada gajina pana patregalannu avara sutta oyyalaguvudu
adu kalatmakavagi alankarisida belliya gajagiruvudu mattu avugalannu tumbuvavaru sariyada pramanadalli tumbiruvaru
